description:
Shido encounters a girl named Nia collapsed on the side of the road, but learns there`s more to this manga artist than meets the eye.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Awateruna. Kore wa Seirei no Wana Da
Don`t Panic. It`s a Spirit`s Trap.
Keine Panik, das ist nur die Falle eines Geistes
Panique pas, Un Esprit te tend un piège
あわてるな. これは精霊の罠だ
